title: 21 Apps That Pay Real Money Instantly
description: Are you looking for the best apps that pay real money instantly? Your phone might be the key to making extra money. Many apps now give you ways to earn real money just by using your phone. These apps let you do simple tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online. You can start... The post 21 Apps That Pay Real Money Instantly appeared first on Making Sense Of Cents.
author: Michelle Schroeder-Gardner
excerpt: Here are the 21 best apps that pay real money instantly. I use many of these apps weekly and have earned over 100 free gift cards and cash!
text: Are you looking for the best apps that pay real money instantly? Your phone might be the key to making extra money. Many apps now give you ways to earn real money just by using your phone. These apps let you do simple tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online. You can start… Are you looking for the best apps that pay real money instantly? Your phone might be the key to making extra money. Many apps now give you ways to earn real money just by using your phone. These apps let you do simple tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online. You can start earning money right away with apps that pay instantly. Some apps send cash to your PayPal account as soon as you reach a small amount, like $5. Others give you gift cards for popular stores. It’s an easy way to make a bit of extra money in your free time. I’ve tried several of these apps myself, and I was surprised by how quickly the rewards add up. Whether I’m playing games, taking surveys, or even just scanning my grocery receipts, these small tasks fit easily into my day. I love the convenience of cashing out instantly with PayPal or getting gift cards to places I already shop at. It’s so easy to earn money for things I’m already doing, and I’ve found that it’s a fun way to bring in extra cash without much effort. If you’re looking for a quick and easy way to earn, these apps are a great place to start! Best Apps That Pay Real Money Instantly Here are my quick picks of the best apps that pay real money instantly without paying: Freecash Swagbucks KashKick Rakuten Survey Junkie Fetch Rewards Branded Surveys Upside Below is the full list of the best apps that pay real money instantly. Proof that I made money on the Freecash app. The $0.05 amounts were rewards for playing 2 minutes each day. The larger amounts like $40, $70, and $150 were for reaching certain levels. 1. Freecash I personally use Freecash, and it’s one of the easiest ways I’ve found to earn a little extra cash with an app platform. Whether I’m playing games or answering surveys, the tasks are easy and fast to do. The best part? I’ve cashed out my points multiple times with no hassle, which is always a plus for me! I also recently made $302 by playing games on my phone in just one week on Freecash. Freecash is a website where you can earn money by doing simple tasks. You can play games (they have a wide variety of games to play like Bubble Cash, Blackout Bingo, Wheel of Fortune, Mahjong, and more!), try new apps, answer surveys, and even win cash prizes to get rewards. When you sign up, you’ll see different offers to choose from. Each offer gives you coins when you finish it. These coins can be turned into real money (like PayPal cash or a bank transfer) or gift cards (to places like Amazon, Visa, Apple, Netflix, Doordash, and more). Many people use Freecash every day to make extra cash. There are thousands of ways to earn on the site. Some offers pay more than others, but most are quick and easy to do. Click here to sign up for Freecash. You can learn more at Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit? Proof that I’ve received over 100 free gift cards from Swagbucks. 2. Swagbucks Swagbucks has been a longtime favorite of mine, and it is one of my favorite apps that pays real money instantly. I love how versatile it is – you can earn from watching videos, taking surveys, searching the web, playing classic games, or even shopping online. I have earned over 110 free gift cards over the years, and it’s been pretty easy! Swagbucks has paid out $609,523,925 over the years to people like you and me. When you have enough SB (Swagbucks), you can trade them for gift cards or cash through PayPal. The minimum to cash out is $1 for certain gift cards and $5 for PayPal. Sign up for Swagbucks here and get a free $5 bonus. You can learn more at Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks? 3. InboxDollars InboxDollars is a popular app that pays you real money for doing easy tasks. You can earn cash by taking surveys, watching videos, and shopping online. Many people like InboxDollars because it has many different ways to make money. You can pick activities that fit your schedule and interests. The app has been around since 2000 and has paid out over $70 million to its users. Surveys are a big part of InboxDollars. They can pay anywhere from 50 cents to $5 each. Some rare surveys might even pay $10. The time it takes to finish a survey varies. It could be as quick as 3 minutes or as long as 30 minutes. Shopping through InboxDollars can earn you cash back. For example, you might get 1% to 10% back when you buy from stores like Best Buy or Kohl’s. When you’re ready to redeem your points, you can turn them into gift cards to places like Amazon, Walmart, Target, Starbucks, and more. Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus. 4. KashKick KashKick is an app that lets you earn real money by playing games and doing other fun activities. You can download it from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store and start making money right away. KashKick has many different ways to make money. You can play games, take surveys, and try out new apps. Each activity gives you a chance to earn cash or rewards. When you earn money on KashKick, you can get paid through PayPal. This means you can get real cash, not just gift cards or points. Sign up for KashKick here. 5. Rakuten Rakuten is hands down one of my favorite cash-back apps. I shop online a lot, so getting money back on things I was already going to buy feels like a win. I especially love the quarterly PayPal payments that show up like a little bonus every few months. I recently bought a kayak online and got $90 cash back, so that is a nice chunk of change! Rakuten is an app that gives you money back when you shop online. It’s easy to use and works with lots of stores (there are over 2,500 retailers you can get cash back at) you probably already buy from such as Old Navy, Target, PetSmart, Macy’s, and more. You can even use it on travel purchases, like Princess Cruises, Hertz, Marriott, Expedia, and more To start, just sign up for a free account. Then use the app to find deals and shop at your favorite stores. Rakuten will track your purchases and add cash back to your account. You can get your money through PayPal or a check in the mail. Rakuten sends payments every three months, as long as you’ve earned at least $5. You can sign up for Rakuten here and get a $30 sign-up bonus. 6. Survey Junkie Survey Junkie is one of the easiest survey apps I’ve used. It’s good for those moments when you have just a few minutes to spare. Survey Junkie is a popular app that pays you for sharing your opinions. It’s easy to use and has over 20 million members. You can make between 50 cents and $5 per survey. Some special surveys might pay up to $20, depending on who they’re looking for. Sign up for Survey Junkie here. Here’s a screenshot of the rewards I’ve earned from my personal Fetch Rewards app. 7. Fetch Rewards I use Fetch Rewards every time I go grocery shopping! Taking pictures of receipts takes just seconds, and I love how the points add up. It feels like a small reward for everyday shopping, and I’ve redeemed my points for gift cards to places like Target and Amazon. You can scan receipts from lots of places. Grocery stores, clothing stores, restaurants, and gas stations all work. Even online purchases count if you link your accounts. Every receipt gets you at least 25 points. Some products give you bonus points. You don’t have to pick offers ahead of time or scan barcodes. You can just shop like normal and snap a picture afterward. You can also earn points and real cash prizes by playing games on Fetch Rewards, such as Bingo and Solitaire. You can turn your points into gift cards for places like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. There are many options to choose from. You can also donate your points to charity if you want. You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here. You can also read my review at My Honest Fetch Rewards Review. 8. Mistplay Mistplay is a free app that lets you earn money by playing games on your phone. It’s easy to use and available for Android devices. This app has over 10,000,000 downloads and a 4.6 out of 5-star rating. They have given away over $60,000,000 to people for playing games on their app over the years. So, it’s definitely popular! You can choose from many different games to play. The more you play, the more units you earn in the app. These units can be traded for gift cards to places like Walmart or PayPal cash. 9. MyPoints MyPoints is an app that lets you earn money for things you already do online. You can get points for shopping, watching videos, and taking surveys. The app is free to use and available on both Android and iOS devices. You can cash out your earnings for gift cards or PayPal money. MyPoints has been around since 1996, so it’s a trusted name in the rewards space. They’ve paid out millions to their members over the years. Sign up for MyPoints by clicking here. 10. Ibotta Ibotta is one of those apps I always recommend to friends because it’s such a no-brainer for grocery shopping. I just add offers before I head to the store and upload my receipt afterward. It’s similar to Fetch Rewards, but it does typically give you more in points because you have to choose your offers BEFORE you go shopping. For example, you may get (offers are constantly changing, so you will want to download the app yourself to see the current rates): $0.35 back for grapes $0.10 back for laundry detergent $3.00 back on diapers $2.00 back on pasta sauce $5.00 back on bodywash And more. Ibotta is a popular app that lets you earn cash back on your everyday purchases. You can use it for both in-store and online shopping. You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here. Recommended reading: 21 Apps Like Ibotta To Earn Cash Back Shopping 11. Branded Surveys Branded Surveys is a way to make some extra cash in your free time by sharing your thoughts on products and services in surveys. It’s super easy to join – you just need to be 16 or older and live in the U.S., Canada, or the U.K. Each survey you take can earn you between 50 cents and $5 (the amount depends on how long the survey is). You’ll answer questions about stuff you buy, places you shop, and things you like to do. It’s pretty simple and can be fun too. You can do surveys while watching TV or whenever you have free time. Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus. 12. Scrambly Scrambly is a fun app that lets you play games and earn money. The app has lots of easy-to-play games like Domino Dreams, Solitaire Smash, and Dice Dreams. As you play, you earn coins. These coins can be traded for gift cards or real money. You can also earn points for downloading financial apps like Sofi, Chime, or Capital One Shopping, as well as downloading apps like Uber Eats. You can cash out your earnings through PayPal, Visa, or Amazon gift cards. The minimum payout is just $1, so you don’t have to wait long to get your money. Scrambly is free to download and simple to use. There are no hidden costs or tricky sign-ups. You just play games or download apps, and collect your rewards. Please click here to sign up for Scrambly. 13. Bingo Cash Bingo Cash is a fun app that lets you play bingo and win real money. You can download it for free on your iPhone or Android phone. The game is easy to play. You get a bingo card with numbers on it. As numbers are called out, you mark them off (this is all done on your phone in the app). If you get bingo, you win! You can play against other people in cash tournaments (there are entry fees to play). Some games have prize pools of $50 or more. Now, while this app is free to download, there are many ways to spend money within the app. So, you will want to be careful not to spend money that you can’t afford to lose. Recommended reading: 23 Best Game Apps To Win Real Money 14. Rewarded Play Rewarded Play is an app that lets you earn money by playing games on your phone. They have paid out $15,149,283.45 to their users already over the years. It’s easy to use and fun too! You can choose from many popular games in the app like Monopoly, Bingo, Yahtzee, Marvel, and more. As you play, you earn coins. These coins can be traded for real cash or gift cards. Rewarded Play pays you real money because they make money from game companies and ads. When you play games through their app, the app earns money from those companies. This can happen when you watch ads or make in-game purchases. Then, Rewarded Play shares some of that money with you as a thank you for playing the games. The app works with PayPal for cash payouts. You can also pick gift cards from places like Amazon or Walmart. 15. Cash Giraffe Cash Giraffe is an app that pays you for playing games on your phone. It’s free to download and use on Android devices. The app has over 10 million downloads and a 4.4-star rating (out of 5 stars) on Google Play. You can start earning money as soon as you download Cash Giraffe. The app tracks how long you play games and rewards you based on your playtime. Cash Giraffe has quick payouts with low cash-out requirements. You can choose to get paid in gift cards for popular stores like Amazon. The more you play, the more you can earn. You can check your progress anytime in the app to see how close you are to your next reward. Cash Giraffe sends gift card codes by email, usually within a few hours of cashing out. 16. Upside Upside is a free app that gives you cash back on everyday purchases. You can earn money when you buy gas, groceries, and food at restaurants. For me, I mainly use it for gas purchases, but there are some great deals in there for restaurant meals too. To use Upside, just download the app and make an account. The app will ask to see where you are and this helps it show you deals near you. When you’re ready to buy something, open the app and claim an offer. Then buy stuff like normal with your credit or debit card. Upside will give you cash back on your purchase. You can usually get up to 25 cents back per gallon of gas, but sometimes I have been given an offer of 80 cents per gallon. At restaurants, you might save up to 35% on your meal. Getting paid is easy. You can transfer your earnings to your bank, PayPal, or get a gift card. It’s an easy way to save money on things you’d buy anyway. You can sign up for Upside by clicking here. You can also learn more by heading to my Upside Review. 17. American Consumer Opinion American Consumer Opinion is a website where you can get paid for sharing your thoughts. It’s free to join and open to people worldwide. You can earn money by taking online surveys. These surveys ask about products, ads, and services. Each survey usually takes about 10 minutes to finish, but some can be much longer or shorter. The pay for surveys varies. You might earn 100 to 5,000 points per survey. One point equals one cent, so 100 points is $1. You can sign up for American Consumer Opinion here. 18. Taskrabbit Taskrabbit is an app that lets you make money by doing odd jobs for people in your area. You can earn cash quickly by helping with tasks like cleaning, moving furniture, assembling furniture (such as if someone bought something from Ikea), or fixing things. The best part is that you get paid soon after finishing a job. This makes Taskrabbit a great way to earn extra money fast when you need it. 19. DoorDash DoorDash is an app where you can make money by delivering food. You can choose when to work and how long you want to work, so this makes it great for earning extra cash in your free time. To make money on DoorDash, you need to sign up as a Dasher. You’ll need a car to make deliveries (and in some areas, a bike or scooter may work as well). Once approved, you can start accepting orders through the DoorDash app. DoorDash pays you for each delivery you complete. You get to keep all your tips too. The amount you earn depends on how many orders you take and how far you drive. You can cash out your earnings daily with Fast Pay. This means you can get your money quickly. There’s a small fee for using Fast Pay, but it can be nice if you need money right away. DoorDash is available in many cities across the U.S. It’s a good option if you like driving and want flexible work. You can make decent money, especially during busy mealtimes. 20. Prime Opinion Prime Opinion is an app where you earn money by taking surveys. You can sign up for free and start doing surveys right away. There are currently over 1,000 surveys available, so you definitely have an opportunity to make money through surveys if that’s what you’re looking for. When you’re ready, you can turn your points into cash through bank transfer (yes, you can get a deposit into your personal bank account for answering surveys), Venmo, or PayPal, or into free gift cards for places like Walmart, Uber Eats, Spotify, Google Play, and eBay. Please click here to sign up for Prime Opinion and get up to a $5 free bonus (500 free bonus points). 21. PrizeRebel PrizeRebel is a website that lets you earn money by taking surveys and doing other tasks online. You can join for free if you’re at least 18 years old, and it is an app that is available in many countries around the world. The main way to make money on PrizeRebel is through surveys. Most surveys pay between 25 cents and $1. Sometimes you might find surveys that pay a few dollars. You can also earn points by watching videos, completing offers, and playing games. These points can be turned into cash or gift cards. PrizeRebel offers many gift card options. You can get cards from popular brands like Amazon, eBay, Apple, and Google. Most gift cards are sent to you digitally within 5 minutes. I have received many gift cards from PrizeRebel over the years, and they are very fast in sending you the gift card code. Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here. Frequently Asked Questions Below are answers to common questions about apps that pay real money instantly. Are there really game apps that pay real money? Yes, there are apps that pay you real money to play games. Some of my favorite game apps that pay real money include Freecash, Swagbucks, and KashKick. I have personally earned $302 by playing Bingo Blitz on my phone in just one week. Which app pays real money fast? My favorite apps that pay you real money fast include Freecash and Swagbucks. Payments come very quickly once you redeem your points. What app can I make $100 a day? Making $100 a day from apps is hard. You’d need to use many apps (for example, you could sign up for a bunch of the apps above and do different tasks on each) and spend lots of time. Freecash might get you close if you do lots of tasks. What apps pay real money instantly without paying? There are many apps that pay real money instantly without paying anything, such as Freecash, Swagbucks, KashKick, and more. Apps That Pay Real Money Instantly – Summary I hope you enjoyed my article on the best apps that pay real money instantly. There are several apps that pay real money instantly for easy tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online. These apps allow you to earn rewards fast, with some paying PayPal payments or gift cards once you reach a small threshold. I have personally used many of the apps above and have earned well over 100 free gift cards over the years, and I still use many of the apps above at least once a week. So, I think they are worth it, especially for how easy it is to earn points. What apps that pay real money instantly do you use? Recommended reading: 12 Best GPT Sites To Make Money Online 22 Ways To Make Money Online Without Paying Anything 20 Best Paid Survey Sites To Make $100+ Per Month 16 Real Ways To Earn Free Gift Cards (Amazon, Target, Visa) 30 Best Money Making Apps 14 Best Apps To Scan Receipts for Money 21 Best Free Surveys That Pay Cash Instantly
html:
Are you looking for the best apps that pay real money instantly? Your phone might be the key to making extra money. Many apps now give you ways to earn real money just by using your phone. These apps let you do simple tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online. You can start…

Are you looking for the best apps that pay real money instantly?

Your phone might be the key to making extra money. Many apps now give you ways to earn real money just by using your phone. These apps let you do simple tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online.

You can start earning money right away with apps that pay instantly. Some apps send cash to your PayPal account as soon as you reach a small amount, like $5. Others give you gift cards for popular stores. It’s an easy way to make a bit of extra money in your free time.

I’ve tried several of these apps myself, and I was surprised by how quickly the rewards add up. Whether I’m playing games, taking surveys, or even just scanning my grocery receipts, these small tasks fit easily into my day. I love the convenience of cashing out instantly with PayPal or getting gift cards to places I already shop at. It’s so easy to earn money for things I’m already doing, and I’ve found that it’s a fun way to bring in extra cash without much effort.

If you’re looking for a quick and easy way to earn, these apps are a great place to start!

Best Apps That Pay Real Money Instantly

Here are my quick picks of the best apps that pay real money instantly without paying:

  • Freecash
  • Swagbucks
  • KashKick
  • Rakuten
  • Survey Junkie
  • Fetch Rewards
  • Branded Surveys
  • Upside

Below is the full list of the best apps that pay real money instantly.

1. Freecash

I personally use Freecash, and it’s one of the easiest ways I’ve found to earn a little extra cash with an app platform. Whether I’m playing games or answering surveys, the tasks are easy and fast to do.

The best part? I’ve cashed out my points multiple times with no hassle, which is always a plus for me! I also recently made $302 by playing games on my phone in just one week on Freecash.

Freecash is a website where you can earn money by doing simple tasks. You can play games (they have a wide variety of games to play like Bubble Cash, Blackout Bingo, Wheel of Fortune, Mahjong, and more!), try new apps, answer surveys, and even win cash prizes to get rewards.

When you sign up, you’ll see different offers to choose from. Each offer gives you coins when you finish it. These coins can be turned into real money (like PayPal cash or a bank transfer) or gift cards (to places like Amazon, Visa, Apple, Netflix, Doordash, and more).

Many people use Freecash every day to make extra cash. There are thousands of ways to earn on the site. Some offers pay more than others, but most are quick and easy to do.

Click here to sign up for Freecash.

You can learn more at Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit?

2. Swagbucks

Swagbucks has been a longtime favorite of mine, and it is one of my favorite apps that pays real money instantly.

I love how versatile it is – you can earn from watching videos, taking surveys, searching the web, playing classic games, or even shopping online. I have earned over 110 free gift cards over the years, and it’s been pretty easy!

Swagbucks has paid out $609,523,925 over the years to people like you and me.

When you have enough SB (Swagbucks), you can trade them for gift cards or cash through PayPal. The minimum to cash out is $1 for certain gift cards and $5 for PayPal.

Sign up for Swagbucks here and get a free $5 bonus.

You can learn more at Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks?

3. InboxDollars

InboxDollars is a popular app that pays you real money for doing easy tasks. You can earn cash by taking surveys, watching videos, and shopping online. Many people like InboxDollars because it has many different ways to make money. You can pick activities that fit your schedule and interests.

The app has been around since 2000 and has paid out over $70 million to its users.

Surveys are a big part of InboxDollars. They can pay anywhere from 50 cents to $5 each. Some rare surveys might even pay $10. The time it takes to finish a survey varies. It could be as quick as 3 minutes or as long as 30 minutes.

Shopping through InboxDollars can earn you cash back. For example, you might get 1% to 10% back when you buy from stores like Best Buy or Kohl’s.

When you’re ready to redeem your points, you can turn them into gift cards to places like Amazon, Walmart, Target, Starbucks, and more.

Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus.

4. KashKick

KashKick is an app that lets you earn real money by playing games and doing other fun activities. You can download it from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store and start making money right away.

KashKick has many different ways to make money. You can play games, take surveys, and try out new apps. Each activity gives you a chance to earn cash or rewards.

When you earn money on KashKick, you can get paid through PayPal. This means you can get real cash, not just gift cards or points.

Sign up for KashKick here.

5. Rakuten

Rakuten is hands down one of my favorite cash-back apps. I shop online a lot, so getting money back on things I was already going to buy feels like a win. I especially love the quarterly PayPal payments that show up like a little bonus every few months. I recently bought a kayak online and got $90 cash back, so that is a nice chunk of change!

Rakuten is an app that gives you money back when you shop online. It’s easy to use and works with lots of stores (there are over 2,500 retailers you can get cash back at) you probably already buy from such as Old Navy, Target, PetSmart, Macy’s, and more. You can even use it on travel purchases, like Princess Cruises, Hertz, Marriott, Expedia, and more

To start, just sign up for a free account. Then use the app to find deals and shop at your favorite stores. Rakuten will track your purchases and add cash back to your account.

You can get your money through PayPal or a check in the mail. Rakuten sends payments every three months, as long as you’ve earned at least $5.

You can sign up for Rakuten here and get a $30 sign-up bonus.

6. Survey Junkie

Survey Junkie is one of the easiest survey apps I’ve used. It’s good for those moments when you have just a few minutes to spare.

Survey Junkie is a popular app that pays you for sharing your opinions. It’s easy to use and has over 20 million members.

You can make between 50 cents and $5 per survey. Some special surveys might pay up to $20, depending on who they’re looking for.

Sign up for Survey Junkie here.

7. Fetch Rewards

I use Fetch Rewards every time I go grocery shopping! Taking pictures of receipts takes just seconds, and I love how the points add up. It feels like a small reward for everyday shopping, and I’ve redeemed my points for gift cards to places like Target and Amazon.

You can scan receipts from lots of places. Grocery stores, clothing stores, restaurants, and gas stations all work. Even online purchases count if you link your accounts.

Every receipt gets you at least 25 points. Some products give you bonus points. You don’t have to pick offers ahead of time or scan barcodes. You can just shop like normal and snap a picture afterward.

You can also earn points and real cash prizes by playing games on Fetch Rewards, such as Bingo and Solitaire.

You can turn your points into gift cards for places like Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. There are many options to choose from. You can also donate your points to charity if you want.

You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here.

You can also read my review at My Honest Fetch Rewards Review.

8. Mistplay

Mistplay is a free app that lets you earn money by playing games on your phone. It’s easy to use and available for Android devices.

This app has over 10,000,000 downloads and a 4.6 out of 5-star rating. They have given away over $60,000,000 to people for playing games on their app over the years. So, it’s definitely popular!

You can choose from many different games to play. The more you play, the more units you earn in the app.

These units can be traded for gift cards to places like Walmart or PayPal cash.

9. MyPoints

MyPoints is an app that lets you earn money for things you already do online. You can get points for shopping, watching videos, and taking surveys.

The app is free to use and available on both Android and iOS devices. You can cash out your earnings for gift cards or PayPal money.

MyPoints has been around since 1996, so it’s a trusted name in the rewards space. They’ve paid out millions to their members over the years.

Sign up for MyPoints by clicking here.

10. Ibotta

Ibotta is one of those apps I always recommend to friends because it’s such a no-brainer for grocery shopping. I just add offers before I head to the store and upload my receipt afterward.

It’s similar to Fetch Rewards, but it does typically give you more in points because you have to choose your offers BEFORE you go shopping.

For example, you may get (offers are constantly changing, so you will want to download the app yourself to see the current rates):

  • $0.35 back for grapes
  • $0.10 back for laundry detergent
  • $3.00 back on diapers
  • $2.00 back on pasta sauce
  • $5.00 back on bodywash

And more.

Ibotta is a popular app that lets you earn cash back on your everyday purchases. You can use it for both in-store and online shopping.

You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here.

Recommended reading: 21 Apps Like Ibotta To Earn Cash Back Shopping

11. Branded Surveys

Branded Surveys is a way to make some extra cash in your free time by sharing your thoughts on products and services in surveys. It’s super easy to join – you just need to be 16 or older and live in the U.S., Canada, or the U.K.

Each survey you take can earn you between 50 cents and $5 (the amount depends on how long the survey is).

You’ll answer questions about stuff you buy, places you shop, and things you like to do. It’s pretty simple and can be fun too. You can do surveys while watching TV or whenever you have free time.

Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus.

12. Scrambly

Scrambly is a fun app that lets you play games and earn money.

The app has lots of easy-to-play games like Domino Dreams, Solitaire Smash, and Dice Dreams. As you play, you earn coins. These coins can be traded for gift cards or real money.

You can also earn points for downloading financial apps like Sofi, Chime, or Capital One Shopping, as well as downloading apps like Uber Eats.

You can cash out your earnings through PayPal, Visa, or Amazon gift cards. The minimum payout is just $1, so you don’t have to wait long to get your money.

Scrambly is free to download and simple to use. There are no hidden costs or tricky sign-ups. You just play games or download apps, and collect your rewards.

Please click here to sign up for Scrambly.

13. Bingo Cash

Bingo Cash is a fun app that lets you play bingo and win real money. You can download it for free on your iPhone or Android phone.

The game is easy to play. You get a bingo card with numbers on it. As numbers are called out, you mark them off (this is all done on your phone in the app). If you get bingo, you win!

You can play against other people in cash tournaments (there are entry fees to play). Some games have prize pools of $50 or more.

Now, while this app is free to download, there are many ways to spend money within the app. So, you will want to be careful not to spend money that you can’t afford to lose.

Recommended reading: 23 Best Game Apps To Win Real Money

14. Rewarded Play

Rewarded Play is an app that lets you earn money by playing games on your phone. They have paid out $15,149,283.45 to their users already over the years. It’s easy to use and fun too!

You can choose from many popular games in the app like Monopoly, Bingo, Yahtzee, Marvel, and more. As you play, you earn coins. These coins can be traded for real cash or gift cards.

Rewarded Play pays you real money because they make money from game companies and ads. When you play games through their app, the app earns money from those companies. This can happen when you watch ads or make in-game purchases. Then, Rewarded Play shares some of that money with you as a thank you for playing the games.

The app works with PayPal for cash payouts. You can also pick gift cards from places like Amazon or Walmart.

15. Cash Giraffe

Cash Giraffe is an app that pays you for playing games on your phone. It’s free to download and use on Android devices. The app has over 10 million downloads and a 4.4-star rating (out of 5 stars) on Google Play.

You can start earning money as soon as you download Cash Giraffe. The app tracks how long you play games and rewards you based on your playtime.

Cash Giraffe has quick payouts with low cash-out requirements. You can choose to get paid in gift cards for popular stores like Amazon.

The more you play, the more you can earn. You can check your progress anytime in the app to see how close you are to your next reward. Cash Giraffe sends gift card codes by email, usually within a few hours of cashing out.

16. Upside

Upside is a free app that gives you cash back on everyday purchases. You can earn money when you buy gas, groceries, and food at restaurants. For me, I mainly use it for gas purchases, but there are some great deals in there for restaurant meals too.

To use Upside, just download the app and make an account. The app will ask to see where you are and this helps it show you deals near you.

When you’re ready to buy something, open the app and claim an offer. Then buy stuff like normal with your credit or debit card. Upside will give you cash back on your purchase.

You can usually get up to 25 cents back per gallon of gas, but sometimes I have been given an offer of 80 cents per gallon. At restaurants, you might save up to 35% on your meal.

Getting paid is easy. You can transfer your earnings to your bank, PayPal, or get a gift card. It’s an easy way to save money on things you’d buy anyway.

You can sign up for Upside by clicking here.

You can also learn more by heading to my Upside Review.

17. American Consumer Opinion

American Consumer Opinion is a website where you can get paid for sharing your thoughts. It’s free to join and open to people worldwide.

You can earn money by taking online surveys. These surveys ask about products, ads, and services. Each survey usually takes about 10 minutes to finish, but some can be much longer or shorter.

The pay for surveys varies. You might earn 100 to 5,000 points per survey. One point equals one cent, so 100 points is $1.

You can sign up for American Consumer Opinion here.

18. Taskrabbit

Taskrabbit is an app that lets you make money by doing odd jobs for people in your area. You can earn cash quickly by helping with tasks like cleaning, moving furniture, assembling furniture (such as if someone bought something from Ikea), or fixing things.

The best part is that you get paid soon after finishing a job. This makes Taskrabbit a great way to earn extra money fast when you need it.

19. DoorDash

DoorDash is an app where you can make money by delivering food. You can choose when to work and how long you want to work, so this makes it great for earning extra cash in your free time.

To make money on DoorDash, you need to sign up as a Dasher. You’ll need a car to make deliveries (and in some areas, a bike or scooter may work as well). Once approved, you can start accepting orders through the DoorDash app.

DoorDash pays you for each delivery you complete. You get to keep all your tips too. The amount you earn depends on how many orders you take and how far you drive.

You can cash out your earnings daily with Fast Pay. This means you can get your money quickly. There’s a small fee for using Fast Pay, but it can be nice if you need money right away.

DoorDash is available in many cities across the U.S. It’s a good option if you like driving and want flexible work. You can make decent money, especially during busy mealtimes.

20. Prime Opinion

Prime Opinion is an app where you earn money by taking surveys. You can sign up for free and start doing surveys right away.

There are currently over 1,000 surveys available, so you definitely have an opportunity to make money through surveys if that’s what you’re looking for.

When you’re ready, you can turn your points into cash through bank transfer (yes, you can get a deposit into your personal bank account for answering surveys), Venmo, or PayPal, or into free gift cards for places like Walmart, Uber Eats, Spotify, Google Play, and eBay.

Please click here to sign up for Prime Opinion and get up to a $5 free bonus (500 free bonus points).

21. PrizeRebel

PrizeRebel is a website that lets you earn money by taking surveys and doing other tasks online. You can join for free if you’re at least 18 years old, and it is an app that is available in many countries around the world.

The main way to make money on PrizeRebel is through surveys. Most surveys pay between 25 cents and $1. Sometimes you might find surveys that pay a few dollars.

You can also earn points by watching videos, completing offers, and playing games. These points can be turned into cash or gift cards.

PrizeRebel offers many gift card options. You can get cards from popular brands like Amazon, eBay, Apple, and Google. Most gift cards are sent to you digitally within 5 minutes. I have received many gift cards from PrizeRebel over the years, and they are very fast in sending you the gift card code.

Frequently Asked Questions

Below are answers to common questions about apps that pay real money instantly.

Are there really game apps that pay real money?

Yes, there are apps that pay you real money to play games. Some of my favorite game apps that pay real money include Freecash, Swagbucks, and KashKick. I have personally earned $302 by playing Bingo Blitz on my phone in just one week.

Which app pays real money fast?

My favorite apps that pay you real money fast include Freecash and Swagbucks. Payments come very quickly once you redeem your points.

What app can I make $100 a day?

Making $100 a day from apps is hard. You’d need to use many apps (for example, you could sign up for a bunch of the apps above and do different tasks on each) and spend lots of time. Freecash might get you close if you do lots of tasks.

What apps pay real money instantly without paying?

There are many apps that pay real money instantly without paying anything, such as Freecash, Swagbucks, KashKick, and more.

Apps That Pay Real Money Instantly – Summary

I hope you enjoyed my article on the best apps that pay real money instantly.

There are several apps that pay real money instantly for easy tasks like taking surveys, playing games, or shopping online. These apps allow you to earn rewards fast, with some paying PayPal payments or gift cards once you reach a small threshold.

I have personally used many of the apps above and have earned well over 100 free gift cards over the years, and I still use many of the apps above at least once a week. So, I think they are worth it, especially for how easy it is to earn points.
